share.message:
Download Zikr App and share it with others to spread the benefit üì±‚ú®

üåü Features:
‚Ä¢ Authentic daily prayers & supplications üìñ
‚Ä¢ Interactive digital tasbih counter with audio feedback üìø
‚Ä¢ Prayer times with multiple calculation methods ‚è∞
‚Ä¢ Qibla direction with compass üß≠
‚Ä¢ Full Arabic & English support with RTL/LTR layout üåê
‚Ä¢ User-friendly interface with favorites system ‚≠ê

üì± Download:
Web Version: https://zikr.valabji.com
Android App: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.valabji.zikr

üçé For iPhone - App Store version coming soon, but you can now:
1. Open the web version link in Safari browser
2. Tap the Share icon (square with arrow)
3. Scroll down and select "Add to Home Screen"
4. Tap "Add" - the app will appear as an icon on your home screen

settings.vibrationOnNext: Only when moving to next zikr

common.prayerTimesDisclaimerText: The calculated prayer times are approximate and based on astronomical calculations according to the location, calculation method, and madhab you select in the settings. For precise prayer times, please refer to the natural signs mentioned in the Quran and Sunnah.

favorites.empty: No favorites added yet. Tap the heart icon to add azkar to your favorites.

contribute.title: Help Us Improve Zikr
contribute.description: Your contribution helps make Zikr better for everyone. Whether you're a regular user or a developer, there are ways you can help:
contribute.usersDescription: Help us verify references, check authenticity, improve translations, send your suggestions for new features or improvements, and report any bugs you encounter. Download our Excel sheet with all Azkar and send your contributions to our email.
contribute.developersDescription: Zikr is open source! Contribute code, fix bugs, add features, or improve the app. Check out our GitHub repository.
contribute.thankYou: Thank you for helping us make Zikr better for everyone!
contribute.linkError: Could not open the link. Please try again later.
contribute.emailError: Could not open email client. Please try again later.

prayerTimes.locationError: Could not determine your location. Please check your location settings and try again.
prayerTimes.refreshError: Failed to refresh prayer times. Please try again.

qibla.locationError: Could not determine your location. Please check your location settings and try again.
qibla.updateLocationError: Failed to update location. Please try again.
qibla.compassNotAvailableNotice: Device compass unavailable. Use external compass or map to find the bearing direction shown above.
qibla.instructionsWithCompass: Hold device flat. Turn until the orange arrow aligns with North (N) on the compass. The arrow points to Qibla.
qibla.instructionsWithoutCompass: Face the bearing direction shown above (e.g., NE, SW). Use a physical compass or map to find this direction. The orange arrow shows Qibla relative to North.
qibla.compassAccuracyText: Mobile phone compass accuracy can vary and may not always be reliable. If you're unsure about your phone's compass accuracy, use a physical compass with the degree value shown ({degrees}¬∞) for the most precise Qibla direction.
qibla.autoSelectDescription: Automatically select the best available method
qibla.gpsMagneticEnhancedDescription: Use GPS magnetic enhanced for improved accuracy
qibla.locationPermissionMessage: Allow location access for more accurate Qibla direction using your current GPS position. This will provide real-time location updates.

locationSettings.title: Location Settings
locationSettings.searchPlaceholder: Search for a city or location...
locationSettings.searchError: Failed to search locations. Please try again.
locationSettings.gpsError: Failed to get GPS location. Please check your location permissions and try again.
locationSettings.ipLocationError: Failed to get location from IP. Please try again.
locationSettings.saveError: Failed to save location. Please try again.
locationSettings.noResultsFound: No locations found. Try a different search term.
locationSettings.permissionDeniedMessage: Location permission is required to use GPS. Please enable it in your device settings.

prayerSettings.title: Prayer & Qibla Settings
prayerSettings.calculationMethodDescription: Choose the prayer time calculation method based on your location or preference.
prayerSettings.madhabDescription: Select your madhab to adjust Asr prayer calculation method.
prayerSettings.notificationsDescription: Receive notifications for prayer times. Note: You may need to enable notifications in your device settings.
prayerSettings.resetConfirmation: This will reset all prayer settings to their default values. Are you sure?
prayerSettings.resetSuccess: Settings have been reset to defaults.
prayerSettings.resetError: Failed to reset settings. Please try again.
prayerSettings.saveError: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
prayerSettings.prayerSettingsSaveError: Failed to save prayer settings. Please try again.
prayerSettings.allSettingsSaved: All settings saved successfully! The app will restart to apply changes.
